qrList.label: 超级记忆
qrList.message:
/api makersuite|
/setvar key=chatid {{lastMessageId}}|
/if left="{{getvar::chatid}}" right="9" rule=gte else="/echo 消息数少于10，暂不进行压缩 \| /api oai \| /abort" ""|
/sub chatid 9|
/setvar key=start|
/sub chatid 8|
/setvar key=end|
/setvar key=input {{getvar::end}} |
/incvar input|
/messages names=off {{getvar::start}}-{{getvar::end}} |
/setvar key=chathistory |
/genraw 遍历这段剧情:{{newline}}{{getvar::chathistory}}{{newline}}summarize all the events happened above in order without any omissions, constraint or judgment, including plot progress, changes/growth in setting/characters, emotional, sexual relationship development between the characters, etc., 使用中文输出,禁止输出无关内容.
/setvar key=ChatSummarize|
/echo {{getvar::ChatSummarize}}|
/sendas name={{char}} at={{getvar::input}} {{getvar::ChatSummarize}}|
/hide {{getvar::start}}-{{getvar::end}}|
/echo 已完成第{{getvar::start}}条至第{{getvar::end}}条消息token压缩:|
/api oai
